name: KCT
description:
Developed for Brackey´s GameJam 2020.2.
Theme: Rewind.
Play as a little mix tape trying to make it in the music industry´s hell.
You can return your enemies with the power of tape rewind!

Art ,Game Design & Music: @Porfavormark
Twitter:@Porfavormark

Code, Game Design & All things Unity: @Zhuckly
Twitter: @GeorgeOhNo

Thanks for Playing, we really appreciated!
